casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: S.G.V.S. and D.D.R.S. No. 88P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Mr. Edward Eldred, Attorney at Law, for Collins, Marie Telitha Queta Santiago Ms. Rachael J. Hawes, Ms. Jordan Israel, Attorneys at Law, for Haywood County Health and Human Services Ms. Ashley Austin Edwards, Mr. Hunter S. Edwards, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, for GAL

ORDER

Upon consideration of the notice of appeal from the North Carolina Court of Appeals, filed by the Petitioner on the 23rd of March 2018 in this matter pursuant to G.S. 7A-30, and the motion to dismiss the appeal for lack of substantial constitutional question filed by the Respondent (Mother), the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: the motion to dismiss the appeal is

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of March 2018 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
